page.title: 12CRAMOND :Leisure/Recreation
page.content: Our suburb has ample facilities for leisure.People can swim,ride bicycles and horses,take walks along the river or foreshore,go sailing, potter about in boats - the list is long. Members of the Cramond Association have access to the buildings and grounds of Dunfermline College which boasts an inddor pool, trampolines, gyms and lots more I haven't yet discovered. During the summer large numbers of tourists arrive to visit the local places of interest such as the Tower and Kirk, the old iron mills and Roman Fort. Home-owners are tolerant of these visitors for though they bring crowding and pollution they bring business to Cramond Inn and the local shops and cafes and they know that Cramond is an attractive place -well worth visiting.
